name: df-re
body: |- wceq(cre, cmpt(s0, cc, co(co(cv(s0), caddc, cfv(ccj, cv(s0))), cdiv, nat2)))
comment: Define a function whose value is the real part of a complex number. See ~ reval for its value, ~ recli for its closure, and ~ replim for its use in decomposing a complex number. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1999.)
